title: People of the ponds
creator_credit: Noel Monkman, Australian Educational Films and Efftee Film Productions
brief_description: Another of the Australian educational short films directed and photographed by Noel Monkman using the facilities of the Efftee Studios. This film features the microscopic life in a rock pool of an extinct Queensland volcano. Narration by Frank Thring.
